column4: anyone: i'm wanting to patch my kernel so that certain things will work with my powerbook. i have found what i think is the raw data of the patch but i dont know waht to do with it. any suggestions?
on my thinkpad disabling acpi helped in that case
what? i am trying mostly to get the audio to work correctly. i can Barely hear it. i just dont know what to do with this "patch"
you better find a powerbook user ;-)
